mapper.select: SELECT m.prod_no prodNo, s.prod_name prodName, i.mid_prod_no midProdNo, i.mid_prod_name midProdName, m.path_no pathNo, m.voucher_no voucherNo, m.raise_date raiseDate, m.raise_user raiseUser, m.`status` `status`, m.versions versions, o.org_name orgName, v.is_finished isFinished, d.label label FROM prod_crafwork_main_plm m LEFT JOIN product_mid_plm i ON i.prod_no = m.prod_no AND i.company_id = m.company_id AND i.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN product_store_plm s ON s.prod_no = m.prod_no AND s.company_id = m.company_id AND s.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN hcm.cas_org o ON o.id = m.org_id AND o.company_id = m.company_id AND o.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN voucher_main_oa v ON v.voucher_no = m.voucher_no AND v.company_id = m.company_id AND v.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN crm.dict_crm d ON v.is_finished = d.`value` WHERE m.deleted = 'F' AND m.prod_no = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND m.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY i.prod_no

SELECT m.path_no pathNo, concat_ws("/",m.prod_no,s.prod_name) midProdMsg, concat_ws("/",m.prod_no,s.prod_name) prodMsg, m.prod_no prodNo, m.prod_no midProdNo FROM prod_crafwork_main_plm m LEFT JOIN product_store_plm s ON s.prod_no = m.prod_no AND s.company_id = m.company_id AND s.deleted = 'F' left join voucher_main_oa o on o.voucher_no = m.voucher_no and o.company_id = m.company_id and o.deleted = 'F' WHERE m.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND m.voucher_no is not null AND m.path_no NOT IN (SELECT m.path_no FROM crafwork_change_main m LEFT JOIN voucher_main_oa o ON o.voucher_no = m.voucher_no AND m.company_id = o.company_id AND o.deleted = 'F' WHERE o.is_finished = 'AS002' AND m.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND m.deleted = 'F') AND o.is_finished != 'AS003' AND m.`status` != 'false'
AND m.path_no LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{pathNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND m.PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND m.deleted = 'F'
